bed down.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to sleep somewhere which is not your bed and where you do not usually sleep
bed down.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Can I bed down on your sofa?
bed down.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make a person or animal comfortable in a place where they do not usually sleep
bed down.translation[0].definitions[2].d: if a new system or arrangement beds down, problems with it are solved and it gradually starts to work in the way that it should
